metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11719 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: When importing a curve25519 private key in PKCS#8format with leading 0x00 bytes, it is possible to trigger an out-of-bounds read in the Network Security Services (NSS) library. This could lead to information disclosure. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 60.8, Firefox < 68, and Thunderbird < 60.8.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
